title: badbye
lyrics:
Bad badbye, no goodbye
Bad badbye, no goodbye
Bad badbye, don't say goodbye
Bad badbye, cuz it's a lie
Bad badbye kill

Kill me, kill me softly

Kill me, kill me softly

Kill me, kill me softly

날 산산 조각 내줘

Kill me, kill me softly (kill me)

Kill me, kill me softly (kill me)

Kill me, kill me softly

날 산산 조각 내줘



You and I

Bad try

You and I

And I cry

You know why

I cry

You know why
